General.Name: LDC Dental Public Company Limited
General.Description: LDC Dental Public Company Limited operates as a dental clinic center in Thailand. The company also sells dental, medicine, and dentistry related products. LDC Dental Public Company Limited was founded in 1992 and is headquartered in Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand.
General.Address: 395-395/1 LDC Building, Mueang Samut Prakan, Thailand, 10270
